\begin{lstlisting}
pub fn foo(&mut self)->T {

self.a.par_chunks(self.chunk_size)
    .zip(self.b.par_chunks(self.chunk_size))
    .map(|(a,b)| a.iter()
                  .zip(b.iter())
                  .fold(0, | acc, ele| acc + *ele.0 * *ele.1)
        )
    .sum()
}
\end{lstlisting}

\choice Sum reduction
\choice Dot Product
\choice Transpose?
\choice thing4
